description.value:
[Addictive] for 3d10 Rounds, ignore negative characteristic effects from Damage and Critical Damage + immune to Stun. Afterwards take -20 to Stength, Toughness, and Agility Tests for 1 hour.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Average

Notes: 20 T
